mapper.select: select r.id ,r.pid ,r.`name` ,r.module ,r.url from sys_role_resource rr inner join sys_resource r on rr.resource_id = r.id inner join sys_role r1 on r1.id = rr.role_id where r1.id = #{roleId} and r1.`status` = 0 order by r1.seq desc

select r.module from sys_role_resource rr inner join sys_resource r on rr.resource_id = r.id inner join sys_role r1 on r1.id = rr.role_id where r1.id = #{roleId} and r.type = 1 and r1.`status` = 0 order by r1.seq desc
select r.id ,r.`name` ,r.module ,r.url FROM sys_resource r where r.pid = #{pid} and r.`status` = 0 order by r.seq desc
